name: Custodians of Space
description:
There are currently over 500 000 pieces of debris left in space from previous launches. Anything from old rocket parts, to lost astronaut gloves, and maybe even an old banana peel? At 30 000 km/h even the finest debris pose a great threat for future space exploration.

In this amazing game, you get the chance to help scientists and future space travellers to a safe journey by collecting as much debris as possible. Use gravity and carefully calculate the best course. Good luck! ;-)
